explains: n. 培养基，基质，基层；底物，酶作用物；（供放置或刻的）底面
wordGroup: ceramic substrate 陶瓷；陶瓷基片；陶瓷衬底

sentences.en: Adults of this species burrow deeply into the substrate where it is cooler and perhaps moister.
sentences.cn: 这个物种的成虫深入到底层中，那里更凉爽，也许也更湿润。
绿板是一种可以接受的基板。

sentences.en: Diaminobenzidine was used as substrate in the techniques.
sentences.cn: 以二氨基联苯胺为底物。
